casebody.data:
TOWN OF CLARKSVILLE, Aaron Stonecipher, Paul Fetter, Jennifer Voignier, and John Gilkey, Appellants-Defendants,
v.
PLUM CREEK CROSSING APARTMENTS, LLC, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-PL-2857 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED May 10, 2019

Unpublished Memorandum Decision

Reversed. Remanded.
